text: ita, nam avatarippicca, nanma niranna oru grantham! atinre mumpulla vedatte sarivekkunnatatre at‌. matrnagari (makka) yilum atinre currubhagattumullavarkk ni takkit nalkuvan venti ullatuman at‌. paraleakattil visvasikkunnavar i granthattil visvasikkunnatan‌. tannalute prart'thana avar muraprakaram suksicc pearunnatuman‌
